testcase.name: Verify that the /identity/api/auth/verify endpoint requires a valid token

failure.message:
status code was: 200, expected: 401, response time in milliseconds: 22, url: http://192.168.1.112:3133/identity/api/auth/verify, response: <!-- ~ Copyright (c) 2014-2024 Bjoern Kimminich & the OWASP experience.", "dismiss": "Me want it!", "link": "But me wait!", "href": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9PnbKL3wuH4" } })}); </script>
